pageHeader.title: Products
pageHeader.description: Manage products all in one place. Easily create, view, and track them here.

physicalItems.title: Physical Items
physicalItems.description: Sell tangible goods and merchandise currently in stock.

digitalGoods.title: Digital Goods
digitalGoods.description: Sell digital items like files, in-game assets and NFTs.

pod.title: Print on Demand
pod.description: Offer custom produced items on-demand, such as apparel and mugs.

events.title: Events
events.description: Sell tickets for events, concerts, and other gatherings.

importModal.title: Import Products
importModal.description: Import inventory catalogs effortlessly by uploading a CSV or Excel file. Also, you can use our fetch tool to import one product or an entire catalog easily from Shopify or WooCommerce using a URL.

fileUpload.title: Upload File
fileUpload.description: Drag and drop your file here, or click to browse
fileUpload.dragDropText: to add a new file or drag and drop it here.

urlInput.title: Import from URL
urlInput.placeholder: Enter product URL from Shopify or WooCommerce
urlInput.description: Import products directly from your store URL
urlInput.error: Invalid URL. Please enter a valid Shopify or WooCommerce URL.

empty.title: No products found
empty.description: Get started by adding your first product

identifiedItemsModal.title: Identified Items
identifiedItemsModal.description: The product importer successfully identified {count} items.

maxSelectionLimit.title: Maximum selection limit reached
maxSelectionLimit.description: You have selected {selected} items out of {total} available items. You cannot select more items at this time.

dropRecords.title: Drop (Digital Product Passport Records)
dropRecords.description: Create onchain digital records for the inventory selected below.

title.description: Enter a unique product name. This will be visible to customers.

termsAndConditions.title: Custom Term of Service
termsAndConditions.description: Display custom terms specific to this product, such as return policies or disclaimers, during checkout.
termsAndConditions.placeholder: e.g., This product is non-refundable after purchase or legal terms applicable to this product.

visibilityStatus.label: Visibility Status
visibilityStatus.description: Set the visibility of this product. If deactivated, customers won't be able to add it to their cart.

public.label: Public
public.tooltip: Customers will be able to add it to their cart

private.label: Private
private.tooltip: Customers won't be able to add it to their cart

productImages.label: Product Images
productImages.description: Upload images or videos that visually showcase the product.

productDescription.label: Product Description
productDescription.description: Describe product features and details to help customers understand what they're buying.

releaseDate.title: Release Date
releaseDate.description: Select a specific release date for this product.

deliveryMessage.title: Delivery Message
deliveryMessage.description: Provide customers with important delivery details at checkout, such as estimated shipping times or special instructions.
deliveryMessage.messagePlaceholder: e.g., Expected delivery within 5â€“7 business days, or include specific delivery instructions.

affiliate.title: Affiliate Market
affiliate.description: Enable this to allow co-sellers to import and sell this product.

collection.label: Collections
collection.description: Select the collection that will feature this product.

generate.title: Generate with AI
generate.description: Populate a product name and description based on the chosen default image.
generate.errorMessage: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again.

eventSync.title: Event Sync Notice
eventSync.description: The event name and description are synced with your connected event account. To make updates, please edit directly in your event account. Changes will automatically appear here.

additionalDetails.label: Additional Details
additionalDetails.keywordsPlaceholder: Type keywords to help customers find this product...

customField.title: Custom Field
customField.description: Add custom information to display during checkout.

podMint2Merch.label: Mint to Merch
podMint2Merch.title: Mint to Merch
podMint2Merch.description: Enable customers to directly print their NFT artwork on the POD product.

physicalProductVariants.label: Variants
physicalProductVariants.description: Add different versions of this product (e.g., size, color).

variantLimitWarning.title: Variant Limit Warning
variantLimitWarning.description: Can't add any more variants. You can only add up to {{maxVariants}} variants.

productShippingType.label: Shipping Method
productShippingType.description: Choose how to ship this product to customers.

productDrop.title: Drop
productDrop.description: Enable onchain records for this digital product.
productDrop.alreadyPublishedError: This product has already been published.

customShippingForm.title: Create New Custom Shipping
customShippingForm.description: Add an option to provide custom shipping details.
customShippingForm.successMessage: Your custom shipping option has been created successfully.
customShippingForm.errorMessage: Failed to create the custom shipping option. Please try again.

detailsModal.title: Product Details
detailsModal.description: Track product inventory, sales data, and applied discounts for seamless order management.

shareModal.title: Share Product
shareModal.description: Share your product with people around the world.

delete.title: Delete Product
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this product? This action cannot be undone.

duplicate.title: Duplicate Product
duplicate.description: Are you sure you want to duplicate this product? A new copy will be created.

publish.title: Publish Product
publish.description: Are you sure you want to publish this product? It will become visible to your customers.

draft.title: Unpublish Product
draft.description: Are you sure you want to revert this product to draft? It will no longer be visible to your customers.
draft.successMessage: The product has been set to draft.

error.defaultMessage: Something went wrong. Please refresh or try again later.

productReorderModal.title: Reorder Products
productReorderModal.description: Organize products by dragging and dropping them in the order that they should be displayed on the storefront.
